title: UrMapp
description: A web application that lets you track which of the 50 states inside the United States of America that you have been to.

title: Table Top Warriors
description: A web application where trading card enthusiasts can create, edit, and store their deck collection from Pokemon, Yu-Gi-Oh, and Magic: The Gathering.

title: Sneak Peek
description: A web application for fashion enthusiasts and sneakerheads to find their next pair of sneakers to go with their wardrobes.

title: PWA Budget Tracker
description: A web application for tacking a budget that allows the user to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without an internet connection.

title: Run Buddy
description: A boilerplate web application that appears to offer fitness training services. Usable as an example for simple web design.

title: Coding Quiz
description: A web application of a simple, timed quiz about coding. It is scored by the time remaining, correct answers increases your time, and tracks a high score list in the local storage.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A web application that uses the One Call API to dynamically update the current and 5-Day forecast based on the city you search.
